quote: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend - or a meaningful day.
name: Dalai Lama

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If it's your job to eat a frog, it's best to do it first thing in the morning. And If it's your job to eat two frogs, it's best to eat the biggest one first.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.
name: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: I wake up every morning at nine and grab for the morning paper. Then I look at the obituary page. If my name is not on it, I get up.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Love. Fall in love and stay in love. Write only what you love, and love what you write. The key word is love. You have to get up in the morning and write something you love, something to live for.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: The sun is new each day.
name: Heraclitus

quote: Thank God every morning when you get up that you have something to do that day, which must be done, whether you like it or not.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: In the morning a man walks with his whole body in the evening, only with his legs.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Commitment is a big part of what I am and what I believe. How committed are you to winning? How committed are you to being a good friend? To being trustworthy? To being successful? How committed are you to being a good father, a good teammate, a good role model? There's that moment every morning when you look in the mirror: Are you committed, or are you not?
name: LeBron James

quote: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. They wake up in the morning and that's the best they're going to feel all day.
name: Dean Martin

quote: Each day is a little life: every waking and rising a little birth, every fresh morning a little youth, every going to rest and sleep a little death.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
name: William Blake

quote: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The man with the best job in the country is the vice-president. All he has to do is get up every morning and say, 'How is the president?'
name: Will Rogers

quote: I think that when you get dressed in the morning, sometimes you're really making a decision about your behavior for the day. Like if you put on flipflops, you're saying: 'Hope I don't get chased today.' 'Be nice to people in sneakers.'
name: Demetri Martin

quote: Everyone has highs and lows that they have to learn from, but every morning I start off with a good head on my shoulders, saying to myself, 'It's going to be a good day!'.
name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: I miss Saturday morning, rolling out of bed, not shaving, getting into my car with my girls, driving to the supermarket, squeezing the fruit, getting my car washed, taking walks.
name: Barack Obama

quote: Do not say, 'It is morning,' and dismiss it with a name of yesterday. See it for the first time as a newborn child that has no name.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: I have always been delighted at the prospect of a new day, a fresh try, one more start, with perhaps a bit of magic waiting somewhere behind the morning.
name: J. B. Priestley

quote: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: If you're bored with life - you don't get up every morning with a burning desire to do things - you don't have enough goals.
name: Lou Holtz

quote: When I woke up this morning my girlfriend asked me, 'Did you sleep good?' I said 'No, I made a few mistakes.'
name: Steven Wright

quote: He, who every morning plans the transactions of the day, and follows that plan, carries a thread that will guide him through a labyrinth of the most busy life.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: I wake up some mornings and sit and have my coffee and look out at my beautiful garden, and I go, 'Remember how good this is. Because you can lose it.'
name: Jim Carrey

quote: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
name: George Washington Carver

quote: Each morning when I awake, I experience again a supreme pleasure - that of being Salvador Dali.
name: Salvador Dali

quote: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
name: William Arthur Ward

quote: In a real dark night of the soul, it is always three o'clock in the morning, day after day.
name: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Arranging a bowl of flowers in the morning can give a sense of quiet in a crowded day - like writing a poem or saying a prayer.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: It ain't as bad as you think. It will look better in the morning.
name: Colin Powell

quote: Each morning sees some task begun, each evening sees it close Something attempted, something done, has earned a night's repose.
name: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: First thing every morning before you arise say out loud, 'I believe,' three times.
name: Ovid

quote: Every morning I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
name: Robert Orben

quote: Some mornings, it's just not worth chewing through the leather straps.
name: Emo Philips

quote: Manners is the key thing. Say, for instance, when you're growing up, you're walking down the street, you've got to tell everybody good morning. Everybody. You can't pass one person.
name: Usain Bolt

quote: A good idea will keep you awake during the morning, but a great idea will keep you awake during the night.
name: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Early morning cheerfulness can be extremely obnoxious.
name: William Feather

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
name: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: I'm always thinking about creating. My future starts when I wake up every morning... Every day I find something creative to do with my life.
name: Miles Davis

quote: It's always such a joy that you wake up in the morning and there's work to do.
name: Jerome Lawrence

quote: I remind myself every morning: Nothing I say this day will teach me anything. So if I'm going to learn, I must do it by listening.
name: Larry King

quote: Good morning is a contradiction of terms.
name: Jim Davis

quote: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
name: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.
name: Robert Duvall

quote: I never really look for anything. What God throws my way comes. I wake up in the morning and whichever way God turns my feet, I go.
name: Pearl Bailey

quote: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
name: Richard Whately

quote: The most efficient way to live reasonably is every morning to make a plan of one's day and every night to examine the results obtained.
name: Alexis Carrel

quote: If some great catastrophe is not announced every morning, we feel a certain void. Nothing in the paper today, we sigh.
name: Lord Acton

quote: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not.
name: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Never face facts if you do you'll never get up in the morning.
name: Marlo Thomas

quote: Tell him he can have my title, but I want it back in the morning.
name: Jack Dempsey

quote: We could hardly wait to get up in the morning.
name: Wilbur Wright

quote: It was a splendid summer morning and it seemed as if nothing could go wrong.
name: John Cheever

quote: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: My formula for living is quite simple. I get up in the morning and I go to bed at night. In between, I occupy myself as best I can.
name: Cary Grant

quote: For the past 33 years, I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: 'If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?' And whenever the answer has been 'No' for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.
name: Steve Jobs

quote: A good wife is one who serves her husband in the morning like a mother does, loves him in the day like a sister does and pleases him like a prostitute in the night.
name: Chanakya

quote: It is well enough that people of the nation do not understand our banking and monetary system, for if they did, I believe there would be a revolution before tomorrow morning.
name: Henry Ford

quote: I arise in the morning torn between a desire to improve the world and a desire to enjoy the world. This makes it hard to plan the day.
name: E. B. White

quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.
name: Tecumseh

quote: The brain is a wonderful organ it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
name: Robert Frost

quote: Probably the happiest period in life most frequently is in middle age, when the eager passions of youth are cooled, and the infirmities of age not yet begun as we see that the shadows, which are at morning and evening so large, almost entirely disappear at midday.
name: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
name: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: I have to be alone very often. I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment. That's how I refuel.
name: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: What's money? A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and goes to bed at night and in between does what he wants to do.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Who will tell whether one happy moment of love or the joy of breathing or walking on a bright morning and smelling the fresh air, is not worth all the suffering and effort which life implies.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: I look upon death to be as necessary to our constitution as sleep. We shall rise refreshed in the morning.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: After all those years as a woman hearing 'not thin enough, not pretty enough, not smart enough, not this enough, not that enough,' almost overnight I woke up one morning and thought, 'I'm enough.'
name: Anna Quindlen

quote: There's nothing sadder in this world than to awake Christmas morning and not be a child.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: A good husband is never the first to go to sleep at night or the last to awake in the morning.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: All men are children, and of one family. The same tale sends them all to bed, and wakes them in the morning.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I've been saying for a couple of years now that people need to let God out of the Sunday morning box, that He doesn't want to just be with you for an hour or two on Sunday morning and then put back in His box to sit there until you have an emergency, but He wants to invade your Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday, and Sunday.
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: It is a common experience that a problem difficult at night is resolved in the morning after the committee of sleep has worked on it.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: The light which puts out our eyes is darkness to us. Only that day dawns to which we are awake. There is more day to dawn. The sun is but a morning star.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got into my pajamas I'll never know.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: I recently took up ice sculpting. Last night I made an ice cube. This morning I made 12, I was prolific.
name: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Every morning I jump out of bed and step on a landmine. The landmine is me. After the explosion, I spent the rest of the day putting the pieces together.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: I have a great deal of company in the house, especially in the morning when nobody calls.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: In my afternoon walk I would fain forget all my morning occupations and my obligations to society.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: And this President wakes up every morning, looks out across America and is proud to announce, 'It could be worse.' It could be worse? Is that what it means to be an American? It could be worse? Of course not. What defines us as Americans is our unwavering conviction that we know it must be better.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: Just in terms of allocation of time resources, religion is not very efficient. There's a lot more I could be doing on a Sunday morning.
name: Bill Gates

quote: A leaf fluttered in through the window this morning, as if supported by the rays of the sun, a bird settled on the fire escape, joy in the task of coffee, joy accompanied me as I walked.
name: Anais Nin

quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: The person who doesn't scatter the morning dew will not comb gray hairs.
name: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Burning desire to be or do something gives us staying power - a reason to get up every morning or to pick ourselves up and start in again after a disappointment.
name: Marsha Sinetar

quote: To be intimate with a married man, when my own father cheated on my mother, is not something I could forgive. I could not look at myself in the morning if I did that. I wouldn't be attracted to a man who would cheat on his wife.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: I have retired, but if there's anything that would kill me it is to wake up in the morning not knowing what to do.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Mom and Dad were married 64 years. And if you wondered what their secret was, you could have asked the local florist - because every day Dad gave Mom a rose, which he put on her bedside table. That's how she found out what happened on the day my father died - she went looking for him because that morning, there was no rose.
name: Mitt Romney

quote: I woke up one morning thinking about wolves and realized that wolf packs function as families. Everyone has a role, and if you act within the parameters of your role, the whole pack succeeds, and when that falls apart, so does the pack.
name: Jodi Picoult

quote: There's pros and cons of a big church. Cons is I don't get to know everybody, I don't get to go to their ballgame, I don't get to marry everybody, but the pros are you get all this community, 800 ushers come in to serve, getting there at 7 in the morning on their day off and coming in on Saturday to make all those wafers.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: My mother had morning sickness after I was born.
name: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: If one morning I walked on top of the water across the Potomac River, the headline that afternoon would read: 'President Can't Swim.'
name: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: I slept with faith and found a corpse in my arms on awakening I drank and danced all night with doubt and found her a virgin in the morning.
name: Aleister Crowley

quote: It was one of those evenings when men feel that truth, goodness and beauty are one. In the morning, when they commit their discovery to paper, when others read it written there, it looks wholly ridiculous.
name: Aldous Huxley

quote: I think about baseball when I wake up in the morning. I think about it all day and I dream about it at night. The only time I don't think about it is when I'm playing it.
name: Carl Yastrzemski

quote: I think it's been hard for people to understand how Islam can be a good religion, and yet the Islamists are evil. Those of us who have had experience with Islam understand this, just as we understand the difference between snake handlers and people going to church on Sunday morning.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Nature gives to every time and season some beauties of its own and from morning to night, as from the cradle to the grave, it is but a succession of changes so gentle and easy that we can scarcely mark their progress.
name: Charles Dickens

quote: The great fun in my life has been getting up every morning and rushing to the typewriter because some new idea has hit me.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
name: Helen Hayes

quote: Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward, and freedom will be defended.
name: George W. Bush

quote: I would like to find a stew that will give me heartburn immediately, instead of at three o clock in the morning.
name: John Barrymore

quote: That's the trouble with being me. At this point, nobody gives a damn what my problem is. I could literally have a tumor on the side of my head and they'd be like, 'Yeah, big deal. I'd eat a tumor every morning for the kinda money you're pulling down.'
name: Jim Carrey

quote: In these times you have to be an optimist to open your eyes when you awake in the morning.
name: Carl Sandburg

quote: Hope is the greatest thing for moms of autism. Hope is what gets us out of bed in the morning. I'm on a mission to tell parents that there is a way.
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: I like to use 'I Can't Believe it's Not Butter' on my toast in the morning, because sometimes when I eat breakfast, I like to be incredulous. How was breakfast? Unbelievable.
name: Demetri Martin

quote: Human life is as evanescent as the morning dew or a flash of lightning.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I myself spent nine years in an insane asylum and I never had the obsession of suicide, but I know that each conversation with a psychiatrist, every morning at the time of his visit, made me want to hang myself, realizing that I would not be able to cut his throat.
name: Antonin Artaud

quote: Man is born in a day, and he dies in a day, and the thing is easily over but to have a sick heart for three-fourths of one's lifetime is simply to have death renewed every morning and life at that price is not worth living.
name: Gilbert Parker

quote: If you want to be an entrepreneur, it's not a job, it's a lifestyle. It defines you. Forget about vacations, about going home at 6 pm - last thing at night you'll send emails, first thing in the morning you'll read emails, and you'll wake up in the middle of the night. But it's hugely rewarding as you're fulfilling something for yourself.
name: Niklas Zennstrom

quote: The thing I love most about going on vacation is that I get to leave behind any kind of schedule. My entire life is scheduled from morning to night, and when I'm on vacation, there is no schedule.
name: Kelly Clarkson

quote: I never married because there was no need. I have three pets at home which answer the same purpose as a husband. I have a dog which growls every morning, a parrot which swears all afternoon, and a cat that comes home late at night.
name: Marie Corelli

quote: When I woke up Sunday morning at the Open and stepped outside and felt the wind and rain in my face, I knew I had an excellent chance to win if I just took my time and trusted myself.
name: Tom Kite

quote: On Sunday morning, I'm not nervous... I can't wait to tell what God wants me to say.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: It seems to me that trying to live without friends is like milking a bear to get cream for your morning coffee. It is a whole lot of trouble, and then not worth much after you get it.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: The happiest part of a man's life is what he passes lying awake in bed in the morning.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: The bed is a bundle of paradoxes: we go to it with reluctance, yet we quit it with regret we make up our minds every night to leave it early, but we make up our bodies every morning to keep it late.
name: Ogden Nash

quote: I protest that if some great Power would agree to make me always think what is true and do what is right, on condition of being turned into a sort of clock and would up every morning before I got out of bed, I should instantly close with the offer.
name: Thomas Huxley

quote: It is a matter of shame that in the morning the birds should be awake earlier than you.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: It is a good morning exercise for a research scientist to discard a pet hypothesis every day before breakfast. It keeps him young.
name: Konrad Lorenz

quote: There is only one thing that a man really wants to do, all his life and that is, to find his way to his God, his Morning Star, salute his fellow man, and enjoy the woman who has come the long way with him.
name: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: And I know this happens because I took economics, and I'd explain it to ya, but I flunked that course. Not my fault. They taught it at 8 o'clock in the morning. And there is absolutely nothing you can learn out of one bloodshot eye.
name: Lewis Black

quote: Then there is a still higher type of courage - the courage to brave pain, to live with it, to never let others know of it and to still find joy in life to wake up in the morning with an enthusiasm for the day ahead.
name: Howard Cosell

quote: Make sure you never, never argue at night. You just lose a good night's sleep, and you can't settle anything until morning anyway.
name: Rose Kennedy

quote: I have so many things to work on, and so many ways that I fail. But that's what grace is all about. and I constantly wake up every morning trying to get better, trying to improve, trying to walk closer to God.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
name: Gena Lee Nolin

quote: What is love? It is the morning and the evening star.
name: Sinclair Lewis

quote: On a day when you're tired, it's important to just say good morning to everyone so they're kind of aware that it's gonna be a good day. Jamie Lee Curtis told me that.
name: Lindsay Lohan

quote: On that Sunday morning the first thing that impressed the people who approached the tomb was the unusual position of the one and a half to two ton stone that had been lodged in front of the doorway.
name: Josh McDowell

quote: A bachelor is a man who comes to work each morning from a different direction.
name: Sholom Aleichem

quote: Like a morning dream, life becomes more and more bright the longer we live, and the reason of everything appears more clear. What has puzzled us before seems less mysterious, and the crooked paths look straighter as we approach the end.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Every year, August lashes out in volcanic fury, rising with the din of morning traffic, its great metallic wings smashing against the ground, heating the air with ever-increasing intensity.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: I am so blessed. I've been way over-blessed. At 64 years old, I look forward to going to bed every night so I can wake up in the morning and see what blessing is going to come my way that day. Because you never, ever know what God's got in store for you.
name: Paula Deen

quote: Above all, this country is our own. Nobody has to get up in the morning and worry what his neighbors think of him. Being a Jew is no problem here.
name: Golda Meir

quote: I always do an all-night horror marathon on Saturdays where we start at seven and go until five in the morning.
name: Quentin Tarantino

quote: Art is why I get up in the morning but my definition ends there. You know I don't think its fair that I'm living for something I can't even define.
name: Ani DiFranco

quote: Your body tells you what it needs, and if you sleep past your alarm on a Saturday morning, it's probably because you need the sleep.
name: Sophia Bush

quote: You wake up in the morning and you look at your old spoon, and you say to yourself, 'Mick, it's time to get yourself a new spoon.' And you do.
name: Mick Jagger

quote: I, of course, meditate for two hours every morning. It's part of my schedule I wake up at 4 a.m. every day and I love it.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: I spend my happiest hours in reading Vedantic books. They are to me like the light of the morning, like the pure air of the mountains - so simple, so true, if once understood.
name: Max Muller

quote: I love being. There's so much wisdom in it. You wake up in the morning and you think, Hey, isn't it great just being?
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
name: Jonathan Swift

quote: Cinema in India is like brushing your teeth in the morning. You can't escape it.
name: Shahrukh Khan

quote: The great secret of doctors, known only to their wives, but still hidden from the public, is that most things get better by themselves most things, in fact, are better in the morning.
name: Lewis Thomas

quote: What inspires you, what excites you when you wake up in the morning?
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
name: Yoko Ono

quote: I'm going to marry a Jewish woman because I like the idea of getting up Sunday morning and going to the deli.
name: Michael J. Fox

quote: And if small businesspeople say they made it on their own, all they are saying is that nobody else worked seven days a week in their place. Nobody showed up in their place to open the door at five in the morning. Nobody did their thinking, and worrying, and sweating for them.
name: Paul Ryan

quote: Driving a motorcycle is like flying. All your senses are alive. When I ride through Beverly Hills in the early morning, and all the sprinklers have turned off, the scents that wash over me are just heavenly. Being House is like flying, too. You're free of the gravity of what people think.
name: Hugh Laurie

quote: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school.
name: Alice Cooper

quote: A play is much easier to maintain your personal life with because if you're rehearsing, you're working like from 11 to 6 or 11 to 5 and you get to have your whole morning and your whole evening. When you're doing the play, you have all day.
name: Maggie Gyllenhaal

quote: There was a chance for me to write one song for the section where Elvis sat in his black leather outfit and sang the old hits. At eight oclock the next morning I had written Memories.
name: Mac Davis

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I feel just like any other insecure 24-year-old girl.
name: Lady Gaga

quote: How like herrings and onions our vices are in the morning after we have committed them.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: 'The Panorama' is also the last place anywhere in New York where the World Trade Center still stands, whole, as it stood in the early morning of September 11. I can also see the corner where I saw the first tower fall and howled out loud. Seeing the buildings again here is uplifting, healing.
name: Jerry Saltz

quote: Experience has taught me, when I am shaving of a morning, to keep watch over my thoughts, because, if a line of poetry strays into my memory, my skin bristles so that the razor ceases to act.
name: A. E. Housman

quote: And my only rule being if when I wake in the morning I'm looking forward to the things that I have to do that day, then I'm on the right track.
name: Demetri Martin

quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
name: Billy Wilder

quote: And if I had a preference, it would be to be able to not be in the studio until 4 in the morning.
name: Alanis Morissette

quote: I recorded my hair this morning, tonight I'm watching the highlights.
name: Jay London

quote: The first thing I think about when I wake up most mornings is the fact that I'm tired. I have been tired for decades. I am tired in the morning and I am tired while becalmed in the slough of the afternoon, and I am tired in the evening, except right when I try to go to sleep.
name: Susan Orlean

quote: Mom was 50 when my Dad died. She got on a bus every weekday for years, and rode 40 miles each morning to Madison. She earned a new degree and learned new skills to start her small business. It wasn't just a new livelihood. It was a new life.
name: Paul Ryan

quote: I think the worst and most insidious procrastination for me is research. I will be looking for some bit of fact or figure to include in the novel, and before I know, I've wasted an entire morning delving into that subject matter without a word written.
name: James Rollins

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I just can't get started until I've had that first, piping hot pot of coffee. Oh, I've tried other enemas.
name: Emo Philips

quote: These flowers, which were splendid and sprightly, waking in the dawn of the morning, in the evening will be a pitiful frivolity, sleeping in the cold night's arms.
name: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: My heart is singing for joy this morning! A miracle has happened! The light of understanding has shone upon my little pupil's mind, and behold, all things are changed!
name: Anne Sullivan

quote: I still, at hotel rooms, I do this one sort of not-so-cool thing: continually shoving my room service tray in front of someone else's door. Because I don't want the remnants. I don't want to be caught, like, being like the pig that I was at two in the morning.
name: Drew Barrymore

quote: To simply wake up every morning a better person than when I went to bed.
name: Sidney Poitier

quote: The less I behave like Whistler's mother the night before, the more I look like her the morning after.
name: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: I don't have to wait until the next morning to regret something I did that was kinda dumb.
name: Bobby Knight

quote: I've just finished my 20th book this past year and I'm working on my 21st book about the Middle East right now that I'll finish this year. And I get up early in the morning and when I get tired of the computer and tired of doing research, I walk 20 steps out to my woodshop and I either build furniture or paint paintings. I'm an artist too.
name: Jimmy Carter

quote: Fashion should be something that in the morning, when you open your window, you say, 'Oh fantastic, sun!' Then you take your shower, you say, 'OK fantastic, which colour I wear today because I feel happy?' This should be fashion.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: Every night when I go to bed, I hope that I may never wake again, and every morning renews my grief.
name: Franz Schubert

quote: I'm very happy with the way I look. I wake up some morning, catch myself in the bathroom mirror, and go, 'hey girl, you're alright'. But on the other hand, I find the website stuff, and the polls, something completely removed from my own personal life. You can't take anything like that too seriously, otherwise you'd end up in the loony bin.
name: Cameron Diaz

quote: One morning, just like 9/11, there's going to be a disaster. I have yet to see the United Nations do anything effective with either Iran or North Korea.
name: Newt Gingrich

quote: By Thursday morning, we'd gotten over the worst of it.
name: William Scranton

quote: I woke up this morning, and I still don't believe I won the Daytona 500.
name: Dale Earnhardt

quote: Swallow a toad in the morning and you will encounter nothing more disgusting the rest of the day.
name: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: I obviously take a lot of pride in what I do on the football field, because that has the ability to influence a lot of people. That puts smiles on people's faces. That gives people a pep in their step on Monday morning when they go back to work.
name: Drew Brees

quote: Autumn arrives in early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.
name: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: I'm a very early riser, and I don't like to miss that beautiful early morning light.
name: David Hockney

quote: I draw flowers every day and send them to my friends so they get fresh blooms every morning.
name: David Hockney

quote: In the morning, I practice 15 minutes of yoga.
name: Vivienne Westwood

quote: There are pros and cons of experience. A con is that you can't look at the business with a fresh pair of eyes and as objectively as if you were a new CEO. Fire yourself on a Friday night and come in on Monday morning as if a search firm put you there as a turn-around leader. Can you be objective and make the bold change?
name: Andrea Jung

quote: Most of the time I spend when I get up in the morning is trying to figure out what is going to happen.
name: Madeleine Albright

quote: You know, I looked at my face in the mirror this morning, and I like being old. My face has more content and when I train in the gym now, I am not training to be strong or handsome - just better than I was yesterday. These days the race is just against myself.
name: Jean Claude Van Damme

quote: Every morning I wake up and thank God.
name: Aaron Neville

quote: I usually decide what to wear in the morning, but sometimes, I'll have a favorite coat or sweater or shoes, and I'll wear them everyday for a week!
name: Cameron Russell

quote: Making love in the morning got me through morning sickness. I found I could be happy and throw up at the same time.
name: Pamela Anderson

quote: I'm not an employee who goes to the office every morning at the same time. Then, vacations are needed.
name: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I saw how many people were poor and how many kids my age went to school hungry in the morning, which I don't think most of my contemporaries in racially segregated schools in the South thought very much about at the time.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: Your computer needn't be the first thing your see in the morning and the last thing you see at night.
name: Simon Mainwaring

quote: Acting is invigorating. But I don't analyse it too much. It's like a dog smelling where it's going to do its toilet in the morning.
name: Liam Neeson

quote: I do believe at the end of the night when you're with your family, the character gets hung up on the door like a coat, and is there to be taken on the next morning.
name: Liam Neeson

quote: As far as I'm concerned, the entire reason for becoming a writer is not having to get up in the morning.
name: Neil Gaiman

quote: You can't be as old as I am without waking up with a surprised look on your face every morning: 'Holy Christ, whaddya know - I'm still around!' It's absolutely amazing that I survived all the booze and smoking and the cars and the career.
name: Paul Newman

quote: It's wonderful to have the most important thing in the world there first thing in the morning. And especially in this business, where the opportunity to think everything is about you is there every day, now I really know that it isn't all about me.
name: Kate Beckinsale

quote: It didn't matter what you look like. You don't have to get up at 5:30 in the morning and there's a lot to be said for that. Corpse Bride can just play all my parts from now on and I'll just do the voice.
name: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: This morning, I went to wipe my hands on a tea towel, and while I was using it, it seemed like it felt a bit light. I unfolded it and realized my daughter had cut little bits out of it to make frocks for her dolls!
name: Emma Thompson

quote: It's a privilege to serve the poor, to be servants of noble Africans, but I better belong in the rehearsal room or in the studio with my band. That's where I want to be and I still wake up in the morning with melodies in my head.
name: Bono

quote: I've been keeping a diary for thirty-three years and write in it every morning. Most of it's just whining, but every so often there'll be something I can use later: a joke, a description, a quote. It's an invaluable aid when it comes to winning arguments. 'That's not what you said on February 3, 1996,' I'll say to someone.
name: David Sedaris

quote: I pray every night before I go to sleep and every morning when I wake up.
name: Demi Lovato

quote: Do you know how many calories are in butter and cheese and ice cream? Would you get your dog up in the morning for a cup of coffee and a donut?
name: Jack LaLanne

quote: But I try to steal other moments. Sometimes I get up very early in the morning and enjoy a quiet house and cup of tea before the craziness begins. Other times, I'll take a quick walk on the beach. You can find peace in a few minutes.
name: Cindy Crawford

quote: I'm actually one of those people who get up energetic in the morning.
name: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: I was taught that to create anything you had to believe in failure, simply because you had to be prepared to go through an idea without any fear. Failure, you learned, as I did in art school, to be a wonderful thing. It allowed you to get up in the morning and take the pillow off your head.
name: Malcolm Mclaren

quote: I became a musician so I wouldn't have to get up at 6 in the morning.
name: Norah Jones

quote: My father-in-law gets up at 5 o'clock in the morning and watches the Discovery Channel. I don't know why there's this big rush to do this.
name: Jeff Foxworthy

quote: Let me tell you, it is still morning in America. It just happens to be kind of a head pounding, hung over for four hours in America - and it's shaping up to be a nasty day, but its still morning in America.
name: Glenn Beck

quote: I was in Washington, D.C., on the morning show, by the time I was 18, programming a station by 19, No. 1 in the mornings. I think I was making, I don't know, a quarter of a million dollars by the time I was 25.
name: Glenn Beck

quote: You won't see me in a better mood than 4:00 in the morning on my way to work.
name: Christina Ricci

quote: I'm always in bed by 11 or 12 and people laugh all the time - they want me to hang out until two in the morning, but n-n-no, I need my nine hours.
name: Christina Ricci

quote: We, the people. Manifest Destiny. Conceived in liberty. Fear itself. Ask not. Morning in America. United we stand. Yes, we can. In times of great change and tumult, presidents seek to inspire beleaguered Americans by reminding them of their national identity.
name: Ron Fournier

quote: I hear that 5 o'clock whistle in my mind like Fred Flintstone and I have to stop. I'm also not much of a morning writer. I have a sweet spot from about 11am to 4pm. But I really work during that time.
name: Diablo Cody

quote: I am never at my best in the early morning, especially a cold morning in the Yorkshire spring with a piercing March wind sweeping down from the fells, finding its way inside my clothing, nipping at my nose and ears.
name: James Herriot

quote: I wake up in the morning, I do a little stretching exercises, pick up the horn and play.
name: Herb Alpert

quote: If you're the village blacksmith and a model T comes along, you better become a mechanic. People's lives are better when they get news online versus having to wait for the morning paper. It's a lot more efficient, a lot more real time, a lot less waste.
name: Marc Andreessen

quote: If I want to get work done, that's usually about 3 in the morning.
name: Marc Andreessen

quote: I see myself at 7:30 in the morning and it's not too pretty.
name: Rod Stewart

quote: I like being in movies that have a great story. I'm not so interested in being a Hollywood star. It's a job, you know. When you wake up at six in the morning every day for a week, it feels like hard work.
name: Kristen Stewart

quote: 'Not again!' I thought to myself this morning, as news trickled out that John McCain was set to pick Alaska governor Sarah Palin as his running mate. Not again, because too often women are promoted for the wrong reasons, and then blamed when things don't go right.
name: Dee Dee Myers

quote: Left to themselves, things tend to go from bad to worse. Murphy's First Corollary If you tell the boss you were late for work because you had a flat tire, the next morning you will have a flat tire.
name: George Edward Woodberry

quote: I can't tell you enough about cinnamon. Cinnamon is an awesome spice to use and it goes great with something like apples in the morning or in a mixture of fruit or in your oatmeal or even in your cereal.
name: Emeril Lagasse

quote: My favorite meal would have to be good old-fashioned eggs, over easy, with bacon. Many others, but you can't beat that on a Sunday morning, especially with a cup of tea.
name: Gary Oldman

quote: No man knows till he has suffered from the night how sweet and dear to his heart and eye the morning can be.
name: Bram Stoker

quote: I love the smell of shampoo on a girl's hair. You can walk past someone and be like, 'Wow, you took a shower this morning, didn't you? Because you smell lovely.'
name: Jensen Ackles

quote: When I travel, I like to take advantage of room service. I'm really into eggs Benedict in the morning.
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: There is a one woman in China that claimed she paid $50 to get my e-mail address. It was pretty shocking. I got one this morning from Scotland. A girl's requesting a signed photo of me.
name: Michael Phelps

quote: First of all, let me say, 1:15 in the morning, for 20,000 people to still be here, I wasn't the winner, tennis was. That's awesome. I don't know if I've ever felt so good here before.
name: Andre Agassi

quote: In the morning we received some very thin coffee. For lunch we had potato soup with a few pieces of meat in it, in the evening we had a very thin meat soup with some potatoes in it.
name: Leon Askin

quote: I woke up one morning to find I was famous. I bought a white Rolls-Royce and drove down Sunset Boulevard, wearing dark specs and a white suit, waving like the Queen Mum.
name: Peter O'Toole

quote: I am not a morning person. I like to sleep in.
name: Martha Plimpton

quote: I try to make films that I find exciting. It makes me want to get out of bed at five in the morning, have my make-up done and play for the rest of the day.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: Making films can be absolutely fantastic, but it can also be incredibly dull. You spend the whole day sitting by yourself in your trailer and then you get called to deliver one sentence - then you're told to come back and do it again at 5:30 the following morning.
name: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: What's the first thing I do when I wake up in the morning? Wish I hadn't.
name: Steven Patrick Morrissey

quote: I drink a bucket of white tea in the morning. I read about this tea of the Emperor of China, which is supposedly the tea of eternal youth. It's called Silver Needle. It's unbelievably expensive, but I get it on the Web.
name: Antonio Banderas

quote: It was really like waking up one morning and going, Wow, I enjoy being with this person more than anybody else in my life, and it just turned out to be mutual.
name: Brian Austin Green

quote: I have never been bored an hour in my life. I get up every morning wondering what new strange glamorous thing is going to happen and it happens at fairly regular intervals.
name: William Allen White

quote: Get up tomorrow early in the morning, and earlier than you did today, and do the best that you can. Always stay near me, for tomorrow I will have much to do and more than I ever had, and tomorrow blood will leave my body above the breast.
name: Joan of Arc

quote: I'd hate to be a teetotaler. Imagine getting up in the morning and knowing that's as good as you're going to feel all day.
name: Dean Martin

quote: I get up early in the morning, 4 o'clock, and I sit at my desk and what I do is just dream. After three or four hours, that's enough. In the afternoon, I run.
name: Haruki Murakami

quote: Somebody said to me this morning, 'To what do you attribute your longevity?' I don't know. I mean, I couldn't have planned my life out better. By all accounts I should be dead! The abuse I put my body through: the drugs, the alcohol, the lifestyle I've lived the last 30 years!
name: Ozzy Osbourne

quote: Training is full-on. Some days I really don't want to get out of bed and hit that track again. Sunday and Monday morning sessions are always horrible. But who really looks forward to going to work on a Monday morning?
name: Jessica Ennis

quote: I'll never forget one morning I walked in and I had a hell of a bruise - it had been a difficult night the night before - and a client said to me, 'Good God, Vidal, what happened to your face?' And I said, 'Oh, nothing, madam, I just fell over a hairpin.'
name: Vidal Sassoon

quote: I should just put it bluntly, because we're all sort of friends here now - it's exceedingly likely that my greatest success is behind me. Oh, so Jesus, what a thought! You know that's the kind of thought that could lead a person to start drinking gin at nine o'clock in the morning, and I don't want to go there.
name: Elizabeth Gilbert

quote: There's nothing in the world more silent than the telephone the morning after everybody pans your play. It won't ring from room service your mother won't be calling you. If the phone has not rung by 8 in the morning, you're dead.
name: David Mamet

quote: 'Old times' never come back and I suppose it's just as well. What comes back is a new morning every day in the year, and that's better.
name: George Edward Woodberry

quote: There is a fundamental situation in which the country has reached rock bottom, that a mother can't send her children out of the house in the morning. The country has reached rock bottom and this needs to be changed.
name: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brishing your teath is the hardest part of the day - it all just hurts.
name: Tom Brady

quote: You lie awake at 3 in the morning thinking of story ideas. You're online at 8 a.m. on a Sunday or midnight on a Wednesday. It's a job that you never push aside.
name: James Daly

quote: Each morning my characters greet me with misty faces willing, though chilled, to muster for another day's progress through the dazzling quicksand the marsh of blank paper.
name: John Updike

quote: You always say 'I'll quit when I start to slide', and then one morning you wake up and realize you've done slid.
name: Sugar Ray Robinson

quote: I'm not one of those writers I learned about who get up in the morning, put a piece of paper in their typewriter machine and start writing. That I've never understood.
name: Wole Soyinka

quote: When I first broke through, there was only NBC, CBS and ABC, and they had news in the morning and in the evening - there wasn't no 24-hour news.
name: Dick Gregory

quote: If you do cardio one day and the next day you can do weights, do it that way. If you need to do it at night or in the morning, do it that way. Whatever you need to get it done, just get it done.
name: LL Cool J

quote: Every Wednesday, my husband and I have a study group with our friends. I attend church. We try to devote time in the morning, say a prayer.
name: Carrie Underwood

quote: I wake up every morning happy for where I am in life. It's not all about the cooking, but the fact that I can contribute by using my influence to help people all over the country. In the last two years, my partners and I have fed more than 10 million hungry people by bringing meat to food banks.
name: Paula Deen

quote: In order to have good fried chicken, you should wash and season the bird the morning you're preparing it for dinner. Don't wait and do it right before you start cooking. Throw it in the refrigerator, seasoned, that morning, and give it a chance to soak up all the salt and pepper and goodness.
name: Paula Deen

quote: Yes, there's such a thing as luck in trial law but it only comes at 3 o'clock in the morning. You'll still find me in the library looking for luck at 3 o'clock in the morning.
name: Louis Nizer

quote: It is not time for mirth and laughter, the cold, gray dawn of the morning after.
name: George Ade

quote: I write when I'm inspired, and I see to it that I'm inspired at nine o'clock every morning.
name: Peter De Vries

quote: Do I get up every morning and ask: am I doing the things that I believe in and am I doing them for the best possible motives? Yes. Unambiguously yes.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: I do yoga every morning, then I run for half an hour and take a sauna.
name: Antonio Banderas

quote: Sometimes I have wrinkles, in the morning. It depends on what kind of night that I had. I accept myself and the way that I am growing older. I have eye bags and some people have proposed to me to take them out but I said no.
name: Antonio Banderas

quote: I wake up every morning, look in the mirror and ask, 'Am I a sex symbol?' Then I go back to bed again. It's stupid to think that way.
name: Antonio Banderas

quote: But when I felt like I had something to prove? Then I got up early every morning and worked all day long. I didn't know if I had any more talent than anyone else directing, but I knew I could work hard at it, and so I did.
name: Ben Affleck

quote: Since I travel so much, it's always great to be home. There's nothing like getting to raid my own refrigerator at two in the morning.
name: Amy Grant

quote: I get up in the morning looking for an adventure.
name: George Foreman

quote: I wake up every morning and I wish I were dead, and so does Jim.
name: Tammy Faye Bakker

quote: It's hard to think of yourself as a brand, especially when I have four daughters who kick my butt early in the morning every day before I go to work.
name: Harvey Weinstein

quote: I was so young, and making movies, going to the studio every morning at dawn was magic.
name: Natalie Wood

quote: As long as the number one worry for people, keeping them up at nights, is whether they're going to have a job in the morning, then they are less likely to resist unfair changes, or unfair treatment, or cuts in real pay at work.
name: Frances O'Grady

quote: It's fairness to say those who work hard, get up in the morning, cut their cloth - in other words 'we can only afford to have one or two children because we don't earn enough'. They pay their taxes and they want to know that the same kind of decision-making is taking place for those on benefits.
name: Iain Duncan Smith

quote: Nowadays, everybody assumes, when they wake up in the morning, if they have a question, it will get answered. Because they have the internet. No matter what the question is, someone will answer their question.
name: Jack White

quote: Sometimes I wish that there were a way to let people know that just because I live in a world without rules, and in a life that is lawless, doesn't mean that it doesn't hurt so bad the morning after.
name: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quote: We all wake up in the morning wanting to live our lives the way we know we should. But we usually don't, in small ways. That's what makes a character like Batman so fascinating. He plays out our conflicts on a much larger scale.
name: Christopher Nolan

quote: Mere humans who root through their refrigerators at three o'clock in the morning can only produce writing that matches what they do. And that includes me.
name: Haruki Murakami

quote: When I wake up at 5 in the morning is it just to jog? Definitely not, I give it all of my efforts.
name: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: A famous person to themselves, they don't get up in the morning and think, I'm famous. I'm not famous to me. Famous is a perception.
name: Van Morrison

quote: I blend my green drink every morning. I also fix my son a full-on American breakfast with bacon and toast.
name: Liz Phair

quote: No city should be too large for a man to walk out of in a morning.
name: Cyril Connolly

quote: The world is new to us every morning - this is God's gift and every man should believe he is reborn each day.
name: Baal Shem Tov

quote: Barack Obama knows that to create an economy built to last, we need to focus on middle-class families. Families who stay up on Sunday nights pacing the floor, like my dad did, while their children, tucked in bed, dream big dreams. Families who aren't sure what Monday morning will bring, but who believe our nation's best days are still ahead.
name: Charles Schumer

quote: I can't live without my beauty products. I love to be in my bathroom with my candles lit, morning, noon and night. I like taking hot baths and hot showers, using my body scrubs and lotions.
name: Traci Bingham

quote: I will check the internet for at least an hour every morning scanning worldwide news to do with child abuse. So if you're constantly putting yourself in an environment where you're checking up on social economics or homelessness problems, if you keep yourself aware of it, you don't really have a day off.
name: Samantha Morton

quote: I wake up at 5:30, 6 in the morning, but don't head into the office right away. I like to hang out with my wife, talk about things, get some coffee, you know.
name: Ice Cube

quote: You come before me this morning with clean hands and clean collars. I want you to have clean tongues, clean manners, clean morals and clean characters.
name: John Burns

quote: It's never really that much fun for me to do movies anyway, because you - you know, you have to get up very early in the morning and you have to go in and you spend a lot of time waiting around.
name: Al Pacino

quote: Look, I hate to sound like Pollyanna, but I literally can't wait to get to work in the morning. I've got steady jobs, I've got my health, and I'm here in the greatest city in the world. I'd be a pig not to be grateful.
name: Christopher Meloni

quote: I'm very silly as a person, but quality silliness on-screen has more of an art to it. Harrison Ford, whom I was in 'Morning Glory' with, has mastered that dry funny better than anyone.
name: Rachel McAdams

quote: In these days a man is nobody unless his biography is kept so far posted up that it may be ready for the national breakfast-table on the morning after his demise.
name: Anthony Trollope

quote: A truly great book should be read in youth, again in maturity and once more in old age, as a fine building should be seen by morning light, at noon and by moonlight.
name: Robertson Davies

quote: Early in the morning, I fell in love with the girl that later on became my wife. At that time, we were so naive. I wanted to charm her, so I read her Capital by Marx. I thought somehow she would be convinced by the strength of his criticism about capital.
name: Shimon Peres

quote: As a child, I had to get up early for school or work. I'd get ready by myself. I'd set my alarm to wake me up very early in the morning, and be off to work, the family driver driving me every morning. I did it alone, my parents never coming in to wake me up.
name: Janet Jackson

quote: I know I have to be like people expect, because people love to dream with me, they like to think that I love my boat of 50 metres, that I drink Cristal for breakfast, that I dance until five o'clock in the morning. I am not like that.
name: Roberto Cavalli

quote: I don't have a single complete show or movie or anything else that I could look at and say, 'Nailed that one.' But endless dissatisfaction is, I suppose, what gets us out of bed in the morning.
name: Hugh Laurie

quote: I get up in the morning and do a seven-minute yoga workout. I know the most likely time I'm going to do something is when I first get up, and I make it short because, like you, I don't really want to do that first thing in the morning.
name: Mehmet Oz

quote: I get up at the same time every morning.
name: Mehmet Oz

quote: I don't ask for the meaning of the song of a bird or the rising of the sun on a misty morning. There they are, and they are beautiful.
name: Pete Hamill

quote: One thing that happens when you're pregnant is that as your stomach starts to stretch. It itches! So I have to keep my belly really lubricated. Every morning, there's a buttering ceremony after I get out of the shower. It's really like basting a turkey with body butter.
name: Padma Lakshmi

quote: If you read about Mussolini or Stalin or some of these other great monsters of history, they were at it all the time, that they were getting up in the morning very early. They were physically very active. They didn't eat lunch.
name: A. N. Wilson

quote: I like to try to do a little work before I do anything in the morning, even if it's a paragraph.
name: Sloane Crosley

quote: My personality, when tasked with creating meals, goes something like this: Is there a way we can make this more difficult? Because let's do that. I don't mean to complicate things. It's just - why buy pre-packaged potato salad when you can spend your morning boiling potatoes and flipping out because there's no dill in the house?
name: Sloane Crosley

quote: When I go out clubbing I can dance 'til three o'clock in the morning with just a water bottle in my hand. I love dancing to anything with a good beat really. My favorite song to dance to at the moment is probably Drake's 'Best I Ever Had.'
name: Jordin Sparks

quote: I'm a car fanatic and each morning I wake up with a smile on my face, whether I'm commentating on the Formula One or at Silver Hatch racetrack in Roary the Racing Car.
name: Murray Walker

quote: The day of the sun is like the day of a king. It is a promenade in the morning, a sitting on the throne at noon, a pageant in the evening.
name: Wallace Stevens

quote: When you walk out of your house in the morning, you don't know what you're going to see.
name: Kyle Chandler

quote: Chronic malnutrition, or the lack of proper nutrition over time directly contributes to three times as many child deaths as food scarcity. Yet surprisingly, you don't really hear about this hidden crisis through the morning news, Twitter or headlines of major newspapers.
name: Cat Cora

quote: I worked at Salon.com way back when they started, and there's just unmeasurable value to distributing words online, too, but I still get my news from the newspaper in the morning.
name: Dave Eggers

quote: I mean, if you have to wake up in the morning to be validated by the editorial page of the New York Times, you got a pretty sorry existence.
name: Karl Rove

quote: Early this morning, I signed my death warrant.
name: Michael Collins

quote: For me the greatest revenge of all is having a happy adulthood, waking up in my gorgeous turquoise bedroom in the morning beside a person who really inspires me. That's the best revenge a girl-loving girl from the Bible belt could possibly have. And, importantly, it's healthy.
name: Beth Ditto

quote: For us political activists and candidates, the morning after any election is a mix of emotions - the personal and the immediate, the culmination of your own recent campaigning efforts and the fortunes of your party and the success or otherwise of what you stand for and believe in.
name: Lucy Powell

quote: One morning, about four o'clock, I was driving my car just about as fast as I could. I thought, Why am I out this time of night? I was miserable, and it came to me: I'm falling in love with somebody I have no right to fall in love with.
name: June Carter Cash

quote: I think my real depressions started when I was about 16 and doing The Patty Duke Show. I would go to bed at about 10 o'clock on a Friday night and not get up again until 6:30 Monday morning.
name: Patty Duke

quote: 'Good Morning America' exploited Joan Lunden's pregnancy, but you won't see me bringing my babies on the air. The only reason I'm talking about the babies at all is that they've been with me on the show since I became pregnant. After a while, I had to acknowledge this pumpkin tummy.
name: Jane Pauley

quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
name: Florence Griffith Joyner

quote: I don't want to clip on the armour every morning. I've seen some politicians do this and they get a bit mangled and bitter. I just refuse to do that. I refuse to be angry or bitter or complain, and I remain open. I may sometimes be a bit too open but I'm not going to change that one bit.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: One thing I've very quickly learned is that if you wake up every morning worrying about what's in the press, you would go completely and utterly potty.
name: Nick Clegg

quote: I've done the most awful rubbish in order to have somewhere to go in the morning.
name: Richard Burton

quote: What is news? It's hard to quantify. Certainly news has changed completely, and the morning shows are not really designed to bring you the news, except to tell you what happened overnight, and the rest of it is a kind of magazine mentality - a little bit of this, a little bit of that. It's harder to be an educated and informed citizen.
name: Harrison Ford

quote: The average, healthy, well-adjusted adult gets up at seven-thirty in the morning feeling just plain terrible.
name: Jean Kerr

quote: I want to host a religious show. I'm sure nobody will be wanting the 11 o'clock spot on Sunday morning. I think we should really get some of our own preachers and preach that gay is good. And we'd have a great choir.
name: Kate Clinton

quote: Previously, on Lock, Stock, I went to bed at two in the morning and woke up at five in the morning, and on this one I was known to nod off on the set occasionally.
name: Guy Ritchie

quote: We went to a small lake, Bass Lake. It was beautiful. It was perfectly still when we got there in the morning. The fog was lifting off the water. It was just magical. And we did catch some fish, 13 fish.
name: Jennifer Granholm

quote: We awoke one morning in September, and the world lurched on its axis.
name: Jeb Bush

quote: I don't wake up each morning saying, 'Oh, wow, it's me. I think I'm the cat's meow. I'm the best.'
name: Jeb Bush

quote: I am a fashion designer. I'm not an environmentalist. When I get up in the morning, number one I'm a mother and a wife, and number two I design clothes. So the main thing I need to do is create, hopefully, exquisitely beautiful, desirable objects for my customer.
name: Stella McCartney

quote: It was huge to read the Proverbs of the day every morning, it was huge to read the Psalm of the day every morning and to get that in us and get us going before the day even started.
name: Tim Tebow

quote: You know how you wake up in the morning and sometimes you look gorgeous and other times you look like you got hit by a mack truck? I realized that my mack truck is food. If I have no sugar, yeast or wine, I have no undereye bags and my skin is perfect.
name: Mariska Hargitay

quote: I exercise every morning. I do light weights - 5lb and 10lb arm exercises - and then lie and lift my arms and legs. It's all about keeping core strength. I do a lot of stretching too.
name: Larry Hagman

quote: Later, in the early teens, I used to ride my bike every Saturday morning to the nearest airport, ten miles away, push airplanes in and out of the hangars, and clean up the hangars.
name: Alan Shepard

quote: My days, if they start in the morning with a cuddle from my son, are just so much more glorious than they were prior to that.
name: Russell Crowe

quote: Every morning I wake at 6am or 6.30am, champing at the bit.
name: John Grisham

quote: The quality of life is so much higher anyplace you can ski in the morning and surf in the evening - there's something to be said for that.
name: Ian Somerhalder

quote: I had the perfect job for a gamer. From February to October, I'd get up at 7 in the morning with nothing to do but play games until I had to be at the park around 1 or 2 o'clock. When I got back after the game, I played until 3 or 4 in the morning.
name: Curt Schilling

quote: I started running 3 miles every morning after throat surgery to remove a cyst last year. The gym used to be my adversary. But that has all changed. Now, I look forward to it every morning.
name: Rachael Ray

quote: Sometimes I wake up in the morning and I am like, 'This is a high-top day' or 'This is a bob day,' but when I get my clothes on that's when I see.
name: Nicki Minaj

quote: When I get up in the morning and put on a pink or a green wig, I see myself as a piece of animation. It lets me be the person I want to be, a person who's not embarrassed to have fun.
name: Nicki Minaj

quote: My brain is so anxiety-prone, like a pinball machine. If I don't get up in the morning and focus my thinking, my breathing, and my being for about 12 minutes, I'm just a screwball all day long.
name: Rainn Wilson

quote: I always like to start my morning with a good amount of fruit. I really like pineapple, particularly because of the enzymes that it has. Sometimes I have oatmeal. But if I'm feeling like I really want to be watching my weight more, then I definitely do a protein, like an omelet, scrambled eggs or some smoked salmon.
name: Cynthia Nixon

quote: Couldn't start the morning without caffeine.
name: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: I really am super lazy and doing long hair, especially mine, is a big pain in the butt. It's filled with cowlicks and kinks and curls and frizz - and it was taking too much time in the morning.
name: Ginnifer Goodwin

quote: I loved fantasy, but I particularly loved the stories in which somebody got out of where they were and into somewhere better - as in the 'Chronicles Of Narnia,' 'The Wizard Of Oz,' 'The Phantom Tollbooth,' the 'Dungeons &amp Dragons' cartoon on Saturday morning in the '80s.
name: Lev Grossman

quote: I have an orthopedic pillow that's made out of a sponge material. I have a plate in my throat, and I have to be careful or I could end up with a bad neck in the morning. That pillow is a must everywhere I go.
name: Lee Trevino

quote: When you really deep down look at it, we go to bed every night, get up every morning, stay here for 70 or 80 years, and then we die.
name: Lee Trevino

quote: The most used piece of kit in my kitchen is my saucepan. I use it every morning to cook my porridge in. The least used piece of equipment? I'd say a food mixer. I've never used it, I don't really know what they're for.
name: David Walliams

quote: I have a Viking stove. The color is butter lemon, and I had to wait several months for it, because that color wasn't available and I really wanted butter lemon! But I don't know that it's seriously ever been cooked on. I mean, I make tea every morning. Does that count?
name: Andy Cohen

quote: Thanks to the greatest invention of recent years, the MP3-playing alarm clock, I can now choose the song that wakes me up in the morning.
name: Rob Sheffield

quote: Stood off and on during the night, determining not to come to anchor till morning, fearing to meet with shoals continued our course in the morning and as the island was found to be six or seven leagues distant, and the tide was against us, it was noon when we arrived there.
name: Christopher Columbus

quote: Tomorrow morning before we depart, I intend to land and see what can be found in the neighborhood.
name: Christopher Columbus

quote: You've got to set yourself up to be as healthy as you can. The thing we tend to do is when it gets to be a bit too hard, we actually opt out for the absolute worst option. For example, if you're in a rush in a morning and you feel like you don't have time to make breakfast, you skip it.
name: Curtis Stone

quote: I'm not a morning person. I'm really not.
name: Brooke Burke

quote: My extravagance is my garden - it's the first thing I look at every morning when I wake up. It gives me so much pleasure.
name: Ina Garten

quote: It is a challenge, with the global fame, to try to act like I put my pants on one leg at a time, when in fact I have Pippa Middleton help me put my pants on every morning. She's my lady-in-waiting as well.
name: Kathy Griffin

quote: I never laugh or smile when I am writing. When I come home for lunch after writing all morning, my wife says I look like I just came home from a funeral. This is not bragging. This is an illness.
name: Carl Hiaasen

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I feel like a billionaire without paying taxes.
name: Ernie Banks

quote: I wake up early in the morning and walk for an hour. If I have something to write, I prefer to write in the morning until midday, and in the afternoon, I eat.
name: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: I was a government employee in the morning and a writer in the evening.
name: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: I kind of woke up one morning and was like, 'Oh I see what's happening, I get everything'. I woke up and was like, 'I get it, I'm a product.'
name: Taylor Momsen

quote: We were doing it under the most extraordinary circumstances, but the first out of the tent in the morning would be David Lean. He said to me on the very first day of shooting, Pete, this is the beginning of a great adventure.
name: Peter O'Toole

quote: Most songs have meager beginnings. You wake up in the morning, you throw on your suspenders, and you subvocalize and just think. They seem to form like calcium. I can't think of a story right off the bat that was that interesting. I write things on the back of my hand, usually, and sing into a tape recorder.
name: Tom Waits

quote: Hitchhiking was such a pure form of existence. You'd wake up in the morning, and you'd have no idea what your day was going to be. And that's something I've never been able to shake. I loved that.
name: John Hawkes

quote: I had the closest thing I have ever had to an out-of-body experience lying in bed one morning. I turned on the 'Today' programme and item four on the news was: 'The shadow chancellor has ruled himself out of the leadership.' I lay there thinking that's interesting, then I realised it was me.
name: George Osborne

quote: I half knew what to expect when I saw the cricket ground in the morning. It was when I started to talk to people working out there, I began to find what I was looking for.
name: Ian Botham

quote: I wake up laughing. Yes, I wake up in the morning and there I am just laughing my head off.
name: Bruce Willis

quote: I love such mirth as does not make friends ashamed to look upon one another next morning.
name: Izaak Walton

quote: I am really passionate about my career and my music and I am so lucky to be able to do what I do for a job, so for all the early morning starts and long days, I could never trade it all in.
name: Rachel Stevens

quote: London is completely unpredictable when it comes to weather. You'll start a scene, and it's a beautiful morning. You get there at 6 in the morning, set up, you start the scene, start shooting. Three hours later, it is pitch black and rainy.
name: David Schwimmer

quote: I derive no pleasure from prosecuting a man, even though I know he's guilty do you think I could sleep at night or look at myself in the mirror in the morning if I hounded an innocent man?
name: Jim Garrison

quote: I was the type of guy that used to get up in the morning and go out and just out run everybody on the field without stretching or warming up or anything.
name: Bo Jackson

quote: Of all the songs I've recorded, 'Amarillo By Morning' always sticks out in my mind.
name: George Strait

quote: I don't mind traveling that much when I can go somewhere and stay there for a while, but touring is different. You rarely see anything. You get there early in the morning and you're resting all day, and you go in and do a sound check, and you do the show, and then bam you're gone.
name: George Strait

quote: The repose of sleep refreshes only the body. It rarely sets the soul at rest. The repose of the night does not belong to us. It is not the possession of our being. Sleep opens within us an inn for phantoms. In the morning we must sweep out the shadows.
name: Gaston Bachelard

quote: Too much coffee. Too much coffee and Gatorade. It's a hell of a mix. If you're ever tired in the morning, just try that mix, and tell me what you think.
name: Kevin Garnett

quote: My principal motivation is supporting my family, which is not a bad reason for getting up in the morning. That's always been my motivation - to take care of the people who rely on me.
name: Tony Parsons

quote: I have to say that when you tour the world, obviously, the jetlags and different hours and ways of living and traveling, a lot of hours in the plane, and you wake up in the morning and you're not quite sure where you are, and it is very tiring.
name: Celine Dion

quote: If we were to wake up some morning and find that everyone was the same race, creed and color, we would find some other causes for prejudice by noon.
name: George Aiken

quote: I eat as much as the next girl, but I work my butt of in the gym every morning! The key is moderation. I splurge on the weekend. A big bowl of pasta and a delicious slice of cake for dessert are my favorites.
name: Giuliana Rancic

quote: In live action movies, you just hope that everything works. Because the actor may had a bad morning and doesn't play good, or accidents happen continuously. Many things contradict what you are trying to say. But in cartoons, nothing contradict what you want to say.
name: John Hench

quote: I've never been a TV junkie. I remember watching Letterman way back when he had a morning show.
name: Todd Barry

quote: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
name: Larry Page

quote: My wife gets all the money I make. I just get an apple and clean clothes every morning.
name: Ray Romano

quote: Wherever my story takes me, however dark and difficult the theme, there is always some hope and redemption, not because readers like happy endings, but because I am an optimist at heart. I know the sun will rise in the morning, that there is a light at the end of every tunnel.
name: Michael Morpurgo

quote: What I couldn't help noticing was that I learned more about the novel in a morning by trying to write a page of one than I'd learned in seven years or so of trying to write criticism.
name: Philip Pullman

quote: I was so obsessed by this problem that I was thinking about it all the time - when I woke up in the morning, when I went to sleep at night - and that went on for eight years.
name: Andrew Wiles

quote: There's also a sense of freedom. I was so obsessed by this problem that I was thinking about if all the time - when I woke up in the morning, when I went to sleep at night, and that went on for eight years.
name: Andrew Wiles

quote: Prince used to call me up 3am in the morning and invite me to hear some of his new songs.
name: Sheena Easton

quote: The one ironclad rule is that I have to try. I have to walk into my writing room and pick up my pen every weekday morning.
name: Anne Tyler

quote: To drive an F1 car you have to be a little mad. On the morning of a race there's a mix of excitement and fear. If it's a wet track, then it's worse as you're not in control most of the time, which is the thing all drivers fear the most.
name: Jenson Button

quote: A lot of people think Formula One isn't a sport because everyone drives a car when they go to work in the morning. But we're pulling up to six G on a corner or during breaking, which is almost like being a fighter pilot. So we have to do a lot of work on our neck muscles.
name: Jenson Button

quote: How many women have the courage to start properly with a cold, cold bath early in the morning? I jump in, throw the water, cold as ice, and after the first plunge I am happy.
name: Anna Held

quote: I am not a morning person.
name: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: I couldn't wait for the sun to come up the next morning so that I could get out on the course again.
name: Ben Hogan

quote: Whereas I used to get depressed or neurotic or dwell on things, I see my son's bright eyes and smile in the morning, and suddenly, I don't feel like I'm depressed anymore. There's nothing to be depressed about when you've got that.
name: Corey Feldman

quote: Most of the top actors and actresses may be working in ten or twelve films at the same time, so they will give one director two hours and maybe shoot in Bombay in the morning and Madras in the evening. It happens.
name: Satyajit Ray

quote: The question is the morning after. What sort of Iraq do we wake up to after the bombing? What happens in the region? What impact could it have? These are questions leaders I have spoken to have posed.
name: Kofi Annan

quote: I never really drank coffee in college, but now I'm on my feet all day and out all night and can't believe it hasn't always been in my life. When morning comes I crave it.
name: Gail Simmons

quote: The thing with me is, if I wake up one morning and I'm not happy working as an actress, I'll stop. It's not something I have to do. It's not a vocation.
name: Samantha Morton

quote: Those golden minutes before you are completely awake, when your mind is just drifting, you have no censorship you are ready to develop any kind of idea. That's when I come up with the best and worst ideas. That is the privilege of being a writer - that you can stay in bed for an hour in the morning and it's work time.
name: Jo Nesbo

quote: The episodes all blend together for me, so I don't remember. I can't even remember what I had for breakfast this morning. I always feel I must be such a disappointment to them.
name: Sarah Michelle Gellar

quote: I still love doing what I do, and I'm really lucky to get up in the morning and want to go to work.
name: Heston Blumenthal

quote: It seems to me madness to wake up in the morning and do something other than paint, considering that one may not wake up the following morning.
name: Frank Auerbach

quote: Now, on nights that I can't sleep, I play video games alone until the morning.
name: Namie Amuro

quote: In West Virginia, the most vulnerable people we have are people who get up every morning and go to work.
name: Joe Manchin

quote: She got the magazine on a Wednesday morning, and on Thursday announced our marriage was over.
name: David Gest

quote: I don't go to Mass every day. But I go to church every day. Just sitting there, thinking - it's a great way to start the morning, you know? You feel so good coming out, and your approach to everything is suddenly really clear.
name: Mark Wahlberg

quote: But to the slave mother New Year's day comes laden with peculiar sorrows. She sits on her cold cabin floor, watching the children who may all be torn from her the next morning and often does she wish that she and they might die before the day dawns.
name: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quote: On the last morning of Virginia's bloodiest year since the Civil War, I built a fire and sat facing a window of darkness where at sunrise I knew I would find the sea.
name: Patricia Cornwell
