quote: I spent every night until four in the morning on my dissertation, until I came to the point when I could not write another word, not even the next letter. I went to bed. Eight o'clock the next morning I was up writing again.
name: Abraham Pais

quote: You know, the market was down yesterday... my first thought when I heard-just on a personal basis, when I heard there had been this attack and I saw the futures this morning, which were really in the tank, I thought, Time to buy.
name: Brit Hume

quote: I have a hotline to the tabloids. When I get up in the morning, I call the Star, and the last thing at night, I call them. I want them to have the inside track.
name: Kirstie Alley

quote: Normal people don't just wake up in the morning and say I think it'd be a good idea to run for president of the United States.
name: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quote: The attorney general would call at 5 o'clock in the evening and say: 'Tomorrow morning we are going to try to integrate the University of Mississippi. Get us a memo on what we're likely to do, and what we can do if the governor sends the National Guard there.'
name: Harold H. Greene

quote: I am a morning writer I am writing at eight-thirty in longhand and I keep at it until twelve-thirty, when I go for a swim. Then I come back, have lunch, and read in the afternoon until I take my walk for the next day's writing.
name: Carlos Fuentes

quote: Both my mum and dad were great readers, and we would go every Saturday morning to the library, and my sister and I had a library card when we could pass off something as a signature, and all of us would come with an armful of books.
name: Geraldine Brooks

quote: If I'm playing in the morning, I'll get some carbs early: porridge with chopped banana. If I'm playing in the afternoon, I'll start with less carbs and have some eggs and fruit for breakfast, then a light lunch about 90 minutes before I play, so I don't feel sluggish or full.
name: Rory McIlroy

quote: Remember my first tenet in getting dressed is how you feel in the morning. So if you're not being true blue to that, it usually shows.
name: Pharrell Williams

quote: Yes, I still love 'South Park,' but I also love morning TV now.
name: Mo Rocca

quote: We hear the stories every day now: the father who puts on a suit every morning and leaves the house so his daughter doesn't know he lost his job, the recent college grad facing up to the painful reality that the only door that's open to her after four years of study and a pile of debt is her parents'. These are the faces of the Obama economy.
name: Mitch McConnell

quote: I was shocked by the amount of Welsh people in L.A. We'd go to this British pub to watch the 'Six Nations' early in the morning and I remember the first time I walked in it was just a sea of red.
name: Matthew Rhys

quote: I'm obsessed with radio. It's a good start to Sunday morning.
name: R. L. Stine

quote: A real New Yorker likes the sound of a garbage truck in the morning.
name: R. L. Stine

quote: I am up at 3:30, reading the op-ed pages and getting ready to be on the air by 6 A.M. on the set of 'Morning Joe,' and after three hours of TV and two hours on the radio, it is only 12 noon.
name: Mika Brzezinski

quote: I have mugs of hot water every morning because the studio is cold, and also because it makes my throat sound clearer.
name: Mika Brzezinski

quote: My salary situation at 'Morning Joe' wasn't right. I made five attempts to fix it, then realized I'd made the same mistake every time: I apologised for asking.
name: Mika Brzezinski

quote: On 'Morning Joe' I can say what I think, be my sometimes unorthodox self, have fun, yet be serious as well.
name: Mika Brzezinski

quote: You'd have to think that you're at least decent, or you couldn't get up every morning and do it. I think if I live long enough, I might be pretty good.
name: Martin Mull

quote: I wake up every morning in a cold sweat, regardless of how well things went the day before. And put that I said that in a somewhat but not completely tongue-in-cheek way.
name: Harvey Pekar

quote: When a man has been consistently battering his wife, he shouldn't expect a bouquet of roses from her the morning after he promises to stop.
name: Joe Slovo

quote: You've got to get up every morning with determination if you're going to go to bed with satisfaction.
name: George Horace Lorimer

quote: I had an amazing childhood, lots of love. But my dad worked his tail off, getting up at 4 in the morning and going off at 5, 6 o'clock, yet he always had time to spend with his kids and his wife.
name: Criss Angel

quote: I have to say when we talk about the treatment of these prisoners that I would guess that these prisoners wake up every morning thanking Allah that Saddam Hussein is not in charge of these prisons.
name: James Inhofe

quote: How can a doctor judge a woman's sanity by merely bidding her good morning and refusing to hear her pleas for release? Even the sick ones know it is useless to say anything, for the answer will be that it is their imagination.
name: Nellie Bly

quote: Even as a kid, I never liked breakfast. I just don't like to eat then. I like to get up and work. I think sticking a whole bunch of carbohydrates in your stomach in the morning is probably the worst way to begin the day.
name: Candace Bushnell

quote: The worst part about pregnancy would definitely have to be my nausea. I don't know why it's just called morning sickness because morning sickness never just happened in the morning for me and it's not happening just in the morning for my sister.
name: Tia Mowry

quote: I'm set to have my best year ever: I'm hiring some acts and there will be a show in the morning, in the afternoon and in the evening. I'm going to use my theater to its fullest potential.
name: Mickey Gilley

quote: It's not easy waking up every single morning knowing what you're going to put your body through and having to do it. We don't have days off.
name: Bryan Clay

quote: I've found myself at one in the morning just sitting at my desk spending an hour returning emails from the day until like two in the morning. It's ridiculous, I should be sleeping, or dreaming, or reading a novel.
name: Brit Marling

quote: The boy who expects every morning to open into a new world finds that today is like yesterday, but he believes tomorrow will be different.
name: Charles Dudley Warner

quote: My life had become a catastrophe. I had no idea how to turn it around. My band had broken up. I had almost lost my family. My whole life had devolved into a disaster. I believe that the police officer who stopped me at three a.m. that morning saved my life.
name: Trey Anastasio

quote: The greatest job I ever had was working on my family farm. Each morning my father would come into my bedroom around 4:30 am and command me to get up and work the fields. I would spend the next two hours before school slopping pigs and cropping tobacco.
name: Armstrong Williams

quote: It only worked for a little while the morning after I agreed to go with Universal, an article came out in the Hollywood trade papers, and the secret was out.
name: Laura Hillenbrand

quote: Every time I get up in the morning, melodies occur to me and I start trying to shape lyrics to melodies.
name: Andrew Bird

quote: Never get married in the morning - you never know who you might meet that night.
name: Paul Hornung

quote: I never thought in a million years I'd be that healthy girl who wakes up every morning to exercise. After being called 'cherubic and chubby,' I'm rocking a bikini!
name: Kelly Osbourne

quote: You were up at 5 o'clock in the morning, and then you'd ride in a caravan, because we didn't have big movie trucks or trailers that is the hardware of a movie camp.
name: Marguerite Moreau

quote: I don't have to get up in the morning and go beat up my body like I used to. I don't have to be out there in August in 108 degree weather down in Texas.
name: Emmitt Smith

quote: Waking up with a bad head in the morning is difficult sometimes.
name: Caroline Corr

quote: There's some things you just have to live with. Like twelve cars camping outside your house, and when you wake up in the morning, they're going to follow you wherever you go. It helps that I live in Valencia. It eliminates some. But they're still here.
name: Taylor Lautner

quote: You show up in Paris, and on the drive from the airport to the hotel you're like, 'This is so cool! I want to see something! I want to go to the Eiffel Tower!' And then you leave the next morning. You think, Oh, I didn't get to do anything. I tell people: I've been just about everywhere, but I've seen nothing.
name: Taylor Lautner

quote: As one gets older, it happens that in the morning one fails to remember the airplane trip to be taken in a few hours or the lecture scheduled for the afternoon.
name: Rudolf Arnheim

quote: I'm a mom - I'm lucky if I get to shower in the morning. Luckily, nail polish stays on my toes. I've been so bad on the upkeep, though.
name: Idina Menzel

quote: A city with one newspaper, or with a morning and an evening paper under one ownership, is like a man with one eye, and often the eye is glass.
name: A. J. Liebling

quote: Probably millions of Americans got up this morning with a cup of coffee, a cigarette and a donut. No wonder they are sick and fouled up.
name: Jack LaLanne

quote: Yeah, I'm not really a morning person.
name: Sophie Ellis-Bextor

quote: Let me tell you, sisters, seeing dried egg on a plate in the morning is a lot dirtier than anything I've had to deal with in politics.
name: Ann Richards

quote: Sydney in general is eclectic. You can be on that brilliant blue ocean walk in the morning and then within 20 minutes you can be in a completely vast suburban sprawl or an Italian or Asian suburb, and it's that mix of people, it's that melting pot of people that give it its vital personality.
name: Baz Luhrmann

quote: It seems a long time since the morning mail could be called correspondence.
name: Jacques Barzun

quote: I tend to start at 9 o'clock in the morning and write until 3. Those are my best hours. They fit the other rhythms of the world. So I write for six hours, pretty much without any breaks.
name: Justin Cronin

quote: I get up, go and get a coffee, and go do the crossword - I'm loyal to one particular paper, the 'Guardian' - and that's my idea of a perfect morning.
name: Laura Marling

quote: After the first day of practice, there's not one guy who's playing at 100 percent or who feels great. Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brushing your teeth is the hardest part of the day - it just hurts.
name: Tom Brady

quote: Throughout my 20s I spent a lot of time just playing and not really working, but fortunately for me I continued to get just enough work, and have a reason to wake up in the morning. I really empathize with some of my peers who had success in the early years then it dries up, and so there's no reason to get up in the morning.
name: Jason Bateman

quote: I try to shave at night so my skin has a chance to settle by the early morning call-time.
name: Patrick Wilson

quote: It was morning through the high window I saw the pure, bright blue of the sky as it hovered cheerfully over the long roofs of the neighboring houses. It too seemed full of joy, as if it had special plans, and had put on its finest clothes for the occasion.
name: Herman Hesse

quote: I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.
name: Gina Carano

quote: I literally have meetings at eight o'clock in the morning, and I finish at nine o'clock at night. It sounds pathetic, but I don't even have time to go shopping.
name: Stella McCartney

quote: I am focused on what needs to be done for the people of Israel. Period. I do not pity myself and I do not pat myself on the shoulder. I get up in the morning full of energy to fulfill my mission.
name: Ehud Olmert

quote: I had three children while doing a show, as demanding as 'Good Morning America,' so this is - you know, it's almost like I'm less daunted about motherhood, and parenting at this point in time. And I think I'm just much more fit and healthy than I was 20-years-ago.
name: Joan Lunden

quote: I'd skip school regularly to see movies - even in the morning, in the small Parisian theaters that opened early.
name: Francois Truffaut

quote: The thing I care about is my weight - I'm as fanatical about it as a member of Girls Aloud. I weigh myself every morning. I know exactly what I want to be - 82kg - and I try to stick to it.
name: Tony Parsons

quote: I was a very undisciplined person but acting was something that actually motivated me to get up in the morning. I hadn't experienced that before, but it was something that really excited me. I think I could be quite self-conscious and it gave me a release.
name: Rufus Sewell

quote: What is life, when wanting love? Night without a morning love's the cloudless summer sun, nature gay adorning.
name: Robert Burton

quote: I don't dream songs. I'm more apt to write dreams down and then to be able to interpret them into a song. I also tend to get up and write prose in the morning from which will come songs.
name: Judy Collins

quote: The crew are the faces you see every morning and last at night before you go home. I spend more time with those people than I do with my friends and family, so they're forever a part of you and who you become as an actor so I hope I see them again.
name: Claudia Black

quote: And I have to say, what motivates me every day and I know my Democratic colleagues is to remember that every day 14,000 people get up in the morning with insurance that go to bed at night without it and most of them because they lost their job.
name: Debbie Stabenow

quote: Nobody has time to keep trying on a load of things in the morning like a teenager.
name: Claudia Schiffer

quote: Sometimes in the morning, when it's a good surf, I go out there, and I don't feel like it's a bad world.
name: Kary Mullis

quote: You know, the men go to tea houses with the expectation that they will have a nice quiet evening and not read about it the next morning in the newspaper.
name: Arthur Golden

quote: It's very important to write things down instantly, or you can lose the way you were thinking out a line. I have a rule that if I wake up at 3 in the morning and think of something, I write it down. I can't wait until morning - it'll be gone.
name: Mary Oliver
